info.name: Django Starter API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Django Starter project.

**Base URL:** `{{base_url}}`

**Authentication:** JWT token is automatically stored after login and used in subsequent requests.

item.name: üîê Authentication (djoser)
item.description:
All authentication endpoints provided by djoser.

**Note:** After login, the access token is automatically saved to the environment variable `access_token`.

request.description: Create a new user account. Role defaults to 'user'.
Activate user account using the UID and token received by email.
Resend activation email to the specified address.
Login with email/password. Returns access and refresh tokens. Access token is automatically stored in the environment variable `access_token`.
Obtain a new access token using the refresh token.
Verify that the access token is valid.
Send a password reset email to the user.
Confirm password reset with UID and token from email.
Change password for the currently authenticated user.
Retrieve the currently authenticated user's details (djoser endpoint).
Update the current user's fields (email/username are read‚Äëonly for security).
Permanently delete the current user account. Use with caution!

item.name: üë§ User Management (Custom)
item.description:
Custom user/profile endpoints from the `UserViewSet`.

**Authorization:** Bearer token required (automatically added if `access_token` is set).

request.description: Get the currently authenticated user's full profile, including nested profile fields.

body.raw:
{
    "first_name": "Johnny",
    "last_name": "Smith",
    "bio": "I am a software developer.",
    "gender": "male",
    "phone_number": "+1234567890",
    "country": "US",
    "city": "San Francisco",
    "address": "123 Main St"
}

request.description: Update the current user's profile (both User and Profile fields).
Deactivate the current user's account (sets `is_active=False`). Can be reactivated by admin.
Retrieve a paginated list of all users. **Admin only.**
Retrieve a specific user by ID. Accessible to the owner or admin.
Update a specific user. Owners can update their own info; admins can also update role and is_active.
Permanently delete a user. **Admin only.**
Change a user's role. Allowed values: `admin`, `moderator`, `user`.

request.description: Fully update a template.
Partially update a template.
Delete a template.
Get all broadcasts.
Create a broadcast. Leave `scheduled_at` null to send immediately.
Send (or schedule) a broadcast. The broadcast must be in draft state.
Get a single broadcast.
Fully update a broadcast (only if still in draft).
Delete a broadcast (only if in draft).
Get all notifications sent to the current user.
Get a single notification by ID (only if it belongs to the user or admin).
Retrieve the current user's notification preferences.
Update the current user's notification settings.
List all email configurations (admin only).
Create a new email configuration. Setting `is_active=True` deactivates any other active config.
Get a single email configuration.
Fully update an email configuration.
Delete an email configuration.
